intent: Canonical interface registry for cross-process contracts and legacy alignment.

interfaces.name: CredentialRepository
interfaces.contract: Persist and retrieve credential records with balance, lock, and DPD fields.

interfaces.name: SignalRepository
interfaces.contract: Create and consume signal records for automation runs.

interfaces.name: AutomationRunner
interfaces.contract: Execute browser automation against configured game portals.
interfaces.migration_notes: Keep UI assumptions co-located in game helpers.

interfaces.name: ForecastEngine
interfaces.contract: Compute DPD and jackpot forecasts and emit signals.

notes: Interfaces are documentation-first; code alignment follows during refactors.
Any breaking change requires a migration note and rollback plan.
